alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sampson County through 630 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Elizabethtown, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Garland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
